entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump 2 million Covid19 cases, 115,000 dead, and Trump says and does nothing. I forgot, he’s going to hold a MAGA rally and none of them will have masks on because Trump doesn’t wear one. What a role model.
